column5: CHECK W/ME FOR AVAILABILITY Amazing property perfect for a family vacation spot, company picnic or family reunion(upon approval). Located just below the dam with a volleyball court and beach entry area into the river. Kayaks provided. Outdoor kitchen area and a couple of acres to run, play and gather under the trees on the river. There are two units for a small family to get away or a larger group.
column8: Dam Camp Unit A, B or Both with 800' river front
